info.name: Cerebellum, cortex, Purkinje cell layer
info.description: The Purkinje cells of the cerebellar cortex form a distinct layer between the molecular and granule cell layers.  The distinctive dendritic tree of the Purkinje cells extends out into the molecular layer.  The axons of the Purkinje cells carry the output of the cerebellar cortex and terminate primarily on the neurons of the deep cerebellar nuclei.
